name: Free-food
body:
# FREE FOOD
HackJam @ Berkeley, 4 Oct 2015  
Project: Free Food Finder  
Technology: [Flask](http://flask.pocoo.org/) (Python), [Facebook Graph API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api)  

-------------------------------  

-Queries Facebook social media graph using a keyword (i.e. location)  
-Retrieves event data using Python [requests](http://docs.python-requests.org/en/latest/) module  
-Filters output to display those events containing "Free Food" and permutations in description  
  
    free food is gr8
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
